_aChangeLog.text: Added a new pain indicator (by Alpha Radke)

_sText:
Mod the turning Counter-Strike: Source Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.

Pack CS:GO Mod (V3.0, GIGN) edited to the best is taken as a basis.
All models and textures were taken ready, created nothing, edited only a little.

Pak's features:
- all weapon from CS:GO
- the interface from CS:GO
- match sounds from CS:GO and the Russian postscoring of radio commands

Original Pak's changes:
- the menu background is replaced
- green color of the radar is cleaned
- qualitative blood in permission 4k
- gloves are changed
- garnets (in the original there was a bug with textures) are replaced
- the knife is replaced with the Bayonet Black model
- the Dual Elites model is replaced with the Tec-9 model
- the Five-Seven model is replaced with the real Five-Seven model (similarity of Tec-9 was initial)
- some sounds of radio commands are replaced

Bugs:
- textures of hands are displayed a little not correctly on some models of weapon

If you want the English postscoring of radio commands, then delete the RUS Sounds folder which is on the way ...Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\custom

Attention!
This mod was tested on the performance on the 88 and 89 version, on other versions of functioning is not guaranteed.
